item.title: Home
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
WE KEEP YOU
RUNNING.
COMPLIANT.
PROFITABLE.

Fuel Systems, Car Wash & Environmental Solutions Across the Western US

Get Service Now
24/7: 800-775-1892

We Understand Your Challenges

EQUIPMENT DOWNTIME

One pump down for 15 days = $7,800 - $29,500 lost revenue

Equipment failures happen at the worst possible times. Friday nights. Holiday weekends. Your busiest hours.

Our Solution: 24/7 Emergency Response

  • 2-4 hour average response time
  • 9 branches across Western US
  • Factory-certified technicians
  • Next-day parts delivery
  • 90%+ of calls completed within 48 hours

COMPLIANCE STRESS

EPA fines: $10,000 to $250,000+ per violation

Tank testing, leak detection, documentation. Regulations change constantly. One mistake can shut you down.

Our Solution: Testing & Compliance Services

  • Compliance specialists track regulations
  • Automated testing schedules
  • Complete documentation for inspections
  • Proactive guidance on requirement changes

VENDOR JUGGLING

Managing 5+ different contractors

Electrical, tanks, fuel equipment, compliance, permitting. They all point fingers when problems arise. "That's not our scope."

Our Solution: Single-Source Provider

  • Design, install, service - all in-house
  • One phone call, one vendor, one invoice
  • Complete accountability
  • 360+ field technicians

Our Markets

Fuel Systems

Complete fuel infrastructure solutions. Installation, service, compliance.

Car Wash Systems

Equipment sales, installation, and 24/7 service for car wash operations.

Environmental Solutions

Compliance testing, remediation, and environmental consulting.

Why Choose NWESTCO?

48-Hour Service Guarantee
90%+ of emergency calls completed within 48 hours. If we miss it, we'll credit your account.

9 Branches, 360+ Technicians
Coverage across 6 Western states. Faster response times. Local support with regional backing.

Single-Source Provider
Design, engineering, installation, service, compliance - all in-house. One vendor. One call.

30+ Years Experience
Family-owned since 1995. We've seen it all. We know what works.

item.title: Why NWESTCO
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Why NWESTCO

We're The Western Partner That Keeps You Running

For over 30 years, NWESTCO has been the trusted partner for fuel systems, car wash equipment, and environmental solutions across the Western United States. We're not just service providers - we're problem solvers who understand what it takes to keep your operation profitable.

Our Story

Founded in 1995 as a family-owned business, NWESTCO started with a simple mission: provide the fastest, most reliable service in the industry. Three decades later, we've grown to 9 branches across 6 Western states, but our commitment remains the same.

What Sets Us Apart

Single-Source Provider

Unlike competitors who outsource, we handle everything in-house:

  • Design & Engineering
  • Installation & Construction
  • 24/7 Service & Maintenance
  • Compliance & Testing
  • Equipment Sales & Parts
  • Training & Certification

One vendor. One call. One invoice. Complete accountability.

48-Hour Service Guarantee

We complete 90%+ of emergency service calls within 48 hours. If we don't meet our commitment, we'll credit your account. That's how confident we are in our response time.

Regional Coverage, Local Service

9 Branches Across the Western US:

  • California (3 locations)
  • Nevada
  • Arizona
  • Oregon
  • Washington
  • Utah
  • Idaho

360+ field technicians means faster response times and local expertise backed by regional resources.

Factory-Certified Technicians

Our team holds certifications from every major equipment manufacturer. We invest heavily in ongoing training to stay ahead of technology changes and regulatory updates.

By The Numbers

  • 30+ Years in business
  • 9 Branches across 6 states
  • 360+ Technicians in the field
  • 90%+ of calls completed within 48 hours
  • 24/7/365 emergency response
  • 1,000s of satisfied customers

Our Commitment

Equipment downtime costs you money. Compliance violations can shut you down. Multiple vendors pointing fingers wastes your time.

We eliminate those headaches. One call to NWESTCO means your problem is our problem - and we solve it fast.

Get Service Now
Call 800-775-1892
